name: DomainDAO
introduce: DomainDAO is a decentralized autonomous organization with the mission to bid on the .dao top-level domain (TLD) and decentralize its governance with fellow DAOs and community members. Upon its successful application with ICANN, DomainDAO will serve as a Registry Operator and run the Domain Name System (DNS) for the .dao top-level domain so that all of its DAO partners can use .dao domains for their websites.
